knimeNode.name: GetAnnotationDatabase
knimeNode.shortDescription: GetAnnotationDatabase - download annotation databases from UCSC

fullDescription.intro: GetAnnotationDatabase can be used to download annotation databases from UCSC, 1000 Genomes Project, dbSNP, dbNSFP or ESP.
fullDescription.option: Plesase set the install path to Annovar.

It's possible to select an predefined organism. In this case the name of the database and the name of the storage folder is set automatically. While selecting 'Other DB' you have to type the database name, you want to download, and the name of the folder, where you want to store the database yourself.
Please specify the annotation type, that you want to download. There are databases of UCSC, 1000 Genomes Project, dbSNP, dbNSFP or ESP available.
